NK016(ma)004:1: // rnal 'byor gyi spyi khrus dong sprugs kyi brgyud 'debs ni /
NK016(ma)004:2: kun bzang phyag rdor ku ku r+aa dza che //
NK016(ma)004:3: in+d+ra b+hu ti sh+aa kya pu tri'i zhabs //
NK016(ma)004:4: sing+ha r+aa dza u pa r+aa dza la //
NK016(ma)004:5: gsol ba 'debs so ngan song dong sprugs shog /
NK016(ma)004:6: go ma de bi rdo rje h+aum mdzad rtsal //
NK016(ma)004:7: sangs rgyas gsang ba bi ma la mi tra //
NK016(ma)004:8: gnyags lo gzhon nu sog po lha dpal la //
NK016(ma)004:9: gsol ba gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes sru legs sgron //
NK016(ma)004:10: sras mchog gzhon snying zhu ston bsod nams mtshan //
NK016(ma)004:11: bde bshegs zur chen zur chung shes rab grags //
NK016(ma)004:12: gsol ba glan dang 'gar ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpal //
NK016(ma)004:13: rdor 'od bsod nams rgyal mtshan chos seng zhabs //
NK016(ma)004:14: sangs rgyas dpal ba bsod nams mgon po la /
NK016(ma)004:15: gsol ba sgrol chen bsam rdor thugs sras sangs rin zhabs //
NK016(ma)004:16: 'gos lo gzhon dpal bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sde //
NK016(ma)004:17: se ston rin rgyan rgya hor rdo rje rtsal //
NK016(ma)004:18: gsol ba pan chen pad+ma dbang rgyal bdud 'joms rje //
NK016(ma)004:19: tshe ring dbang po ngag dbang phun tshogs mtshan //
NK016(ma)004:20: brgyud srol kun 'dus rig 'dzin gter bdag gling //
NK016(ma)004:21: gsol ba lo chen chos dpal rgyal sras rin rnam zhabs //
NK016(ma)004:22: pad+ma bstan 'dzin phrin las rnam par rgyal //
NK016(ma)004:23: phrin las chos sgron sangs rgyas kun dag'i dpal //
NK016(ma)004:24: gsol ba bstan 'dzin nor bu phan bde'i 'od zer 'bar //
NK016(ma)004:25: khyab bdag drin chen rtsa brgyud bla ma dang //
NK016(ma)004:26: rab 'byams zhi khro dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lhar //
NK016(ma)004:27: gsol ba brgyud gsum bla ma'i byin rlabs snying la zhugs //
NK016(ma)004:28: nyams chag rtog sgrib mun pa dbyings su dag /
NK016(ma)004:29: smin grol lam bzang rang rig ngo bor 'dres //
NK016(ma)004:30: bdag gzhan don gnyis 'grub par byin gyis rlobs //
NK016(ma)004:31: zhes rgyal khams pa 'gyur med rdo rjes so //
NK016(ma)004:32: de ltar gter chen 'gyur med rdo rje'i gsung la
NK016(ma)004:33: brgyud pa'i mtshan rim gsal cha cung zad dang bcas
NK016(ma)004:34: gter chen nas bdag gi rigs bdag bla ma'i bar
NK016(ma)004:35: kha skong ba po ni 'jigs bral ye shes rdo
